blockbreak.description: Break a set amount of blocks.

amount.description: The amount of blocks to break.

block.note: Omitting this value will allow any block to be broken.

data.description: The data value of the block to break.
data.note: Not required for Minecraft versions 1.13 and above.

reverse-if-placed.description: Whether placing blocks should decrement from the quest progress.

allow-negative-progress.description: Whether the quest progress can go into the negatives.

allow-silk-touch.description: Whether blocks broken with a silk touch pickaxe should count towards the quest progress.

check-coreprotect.description: Whether the plugin should query CoreProtect if a block has been recently placed.
check-coreprotect.note: This requires the CoreProtect plugin to be installed.

check-coreprotect-time.description: How long ago (in seconds) the plugin should check with CoreProtect whether a block was placed.
check-coreprotect-time.note: This requires the CoreProtect plugin to be installed.

check-playerblocktracker.description: Whether the plugin should query PlayerBlockTracker if a block has been recently placed.
check-playerblocktracker.note: This requires the PlayerBlockTracker plugin to be installed.

worlds.description: The worlds in which the blocks should be broken.

blockplace.description: Place a set amount of blocks.

amount.description: The amount of blocks to place.

block.note: Omitting this value will allow any block to be place.

data.description: The data value of the block to place.
data.note: Not required for Minecraft versions 1.13 and above.

reverse-if-broken.description: Whether breaking blocks should decrement from the quest progress.

worlds.description: The worlds in which the blocks should be broken.
